summary.name: Praveen Kumar Kushwaha
summary.description: MCA Graduate (2025) in Computer Applications. Proficient in React Native, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, and RESTful API integration. Skilled in C++, Python, and JavaScript. Specializes in full-stack mobile development and AI-powered applications. Passionate about building scalable apps and contributing to innovative tech environments.

projects.title: AI Study Companion (Full-Stack Mobile App)
projects.technologies: React Native, Node.js, Express.js, RESTful APIs, Firebase
projects.description: Integrated Gemini API to provide topic explanations and doubt-solving. Used YouTube and Google Custom Search APIs to fetch videos and PDFs. Implemented a Lang Search API filter to rank results. Used a Node.js backend to secure external API calls.

projects.title: Website Guide Voice Assistant
projects.technologies: Python, NLP, Google Web Speech API
projects.description: Built an AI-driven multilingual voice assistant (English/Hindi) using Google Web Speech API for speech recognition. Automated website navigation and FAQ responses, leveraging NLP for speech-to-text and text-to-speech.

projects.title: FitMate Your Personal Fitness & Diet Companion
projects.description: A React Native Expo app powered by the ExerciseDB API that helps users stay fit with personalized exercise variations and a customized diet plan. It features personalized exercise recommendations, tailored diet plans, and progress tracking.

certifications_honors: Solved over 200 coding problems on platforms like LeetCode and HackerRank.
Earned Gold Badge in C++ on HackerRank.
Certified in Full Stack Web Development by NASSCOM.
Secured 3rd Rank in Bachelor's degree program.
Represented institute at a Regional-level Youth Parliament.
